thread.title: Oprah Pours Margaritas for 'Wrinkle in Time' Cast at Wrap Party
thread.title_full: Oprah Pours Margaritas for 'Wrinkle in Time' Cast at Wrap Party | TMZ.com

author: TMZ Staff
title: Oprah Pours Margaritas for 'Wrinkle in Time' Cast at Wrap Party
text:
Oprah knew exactly how to unwind at the end of shooting her new movie -- little margarita mix and a lot of tequila.
O was in New Zealand Wednesday playing bartender for the cast and crew of " A Wrinkle in Time ." Her co-star,  Reese Witherspoon , seemed more than happy to let Oprah "get behind the tequila wheel!"
If the movie's half as good as this ... director Ava DuVernay 's gonna score another hit. 
Best wrap party. Ever.
